title: The coppie of the Anti-Spaniard made at Paris by a French man, a Catholique. Wherein is directly proued how the Spanish King is the onely cause of all the troubles in France. Translated out of French into English.
author: Arnauld, Antoine, 1560-1619, attributed name.
notes: A translation by Anthony Munday of the French original, which is attributed to Antoine Arnauld and to Michel Hurault.
In this edition title page line 3 ends: 'Anti-Spaniard'; quires D-F in same setting as STC 684.
Item at reel 644:18 identified as STC 684a.
Reproductions of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
